Test.Name: Correct response without DoorInfo

Test.Name: Empty list of items returned when Limit = 1
Test.Description: Check GET DOOR INFO LIST – TOKEN LIST test when DUT returns GetDoorInfoListResponse with empty ArrayOfDoorInfo

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
DOORCONTROL-2-1-5 GET DOOR INFO - LIMIT
STEP 1 - Get Door Control service address Transmit done Receive done http://localhost:3246/onvif/ServiceDoor11/DoorService.asmx STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Get DoorInfo list Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Check that tokens are unique STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Get DoorInfo list with limit = 1 Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 5 - Check response No DoorInfo information returned STEP FAILED
TEST FAILED
